title: Episode 1 - Sam Altman, President of Y Combinator (Interviewed by Tom Giles)
description: Early-stage tech entrepreneurs face many nuanced problems. Sam Altman shares useful insights gleaned from the many companies incubated through Y Combinator.
dc:creator: Bloomberg
itunes:summary: Early-stage tech entrepreneurs face many nuanced problems. Sam Altman shares useful insights gleaned from the many companies incubated through Y Combinator.
